老游戏了，花了四个小时通关，感觉创意真的非常好，很有趣，很好玩，不愧为一代神作。。。关卡解谜需要稍微思考，只要熟练了传送门重力枪的用法其实并不算太难，是款考验逻辑思维的游戏利用传送门与物理重力慢慢就找到节奏了。。。从下午到晚上终于从高级实验室逃脱出来，获得了自由。啊哈哈哈哈哈

Эта игра переворачивает сознание и выводит разум за грани привычного мысления. Именно так в 2007 году сказал бы любой, кто в неё поиграл хотя бы пару уровней.
Valve把FPS和解密融合的非常巧妙，我们平常玩了那么多广义上的FPS，而这部作品就很好的颠覆了什么是FPS，我们在玩腻了这些血腥暴力的，割草的，对战的FPS之后，来玩玩这种清新脱俗的FPS也还别有一番风味呢
Solve puzzles, Defeat a killer AI, Try and work out the truth about cake. What's not to love?

THECAKEISALIETHECAKEISALIETHECAKEISALIETHECAKEISALIETHecakeis...

Portal é um jogo de puzzle muito bem elaborado e divertido. O jogo também possui a minha vilã preferida, Glados, que traz um humor para o jogo e possivelmente vai tirar um sorrisinho do seu rosto. A hisória é muito boa, e a jogabilidade também. Os gráficos são muito bons (Há quem diga que são ultrapassados, mas vai de cada um) e a minha experiência com o jogo foi incrível. Se você ainda não jogou, compre sem medo (Ou em uma promoção).
Such a short game, but beautifully formed.  GlaDOS is one of my favourite computer game characters.  Will there be a Portal 3?

I now know the truth. The cake is a lie. 

I was recommended this game by a friend, who only stated that the cake is a lie. He didn't want to spoil anything for me, and while it is sort of a sparse recommendation, I now know he told the truth.

I strongly recommend this game. And the cake is a lie.

Wow. just wow. Thats all I can say about this game. The moment i started playing it i was immediately captivated and i did not want to stop playing it. A must buy.

Come on.  Do you really need a review for this game?  It's Portal, a virtually flawless puzzle/platformer with an intriguing story, interesting environment, and just plain fun gameplay.  Simply an unforgettable experience!  Buy this.  You will not regret it.

PROS
+ Portal/warping gameplay is thought-provoking and fun
+ Intriguing world and storyline keeps you engrossed
+ Smooth pace flawlessly introduces new gameplay elements and skills
+ GLaDOS is a classic, unforgettable character with memorable and hilarious dialogue
+ Excellent controls, graphics, and sound (and an amazing ending song!)

CONS
- Fairly short and easy
- Limited replay value (yet I find myself playing this again and again...)
КУРУТАЯ ИГРА!!!

Portal:

Being one of the only 3 games I will ever label as a 'Perfect 10/10', portal just ticks off all the boxes. It is a must have if you call yourself a gamer. Even if you bought 2 first, you must buy one as well, its a completely different experience.

This game was made back in 2007, but it holds up to AAA games made nearly 10 years later. Graphically speaking, no it doesnt, but story-wise and gameplay will give you an immediate sensation of happiness.

And dont forget, you get your own companion cube.

10/10

(I Nominated this for the 'Test of Time' Steam Awards 2016)

Portal é um jogo muito bom para quem gosta de puzzles, além de uma ótima história. Seus mistérios só serão explicados completamente completando o 1º jogo lendo a HQ que pode ser adiquirida na Steam e completando o segundo jogo. 
Definitivamente este é um jogo que merece ser jogado.
E não se esqueçam: The cake is a lie!

Even though this game was made in 2007, it plays like it was just made yesterday. The story will pull you in and the mechanics will keep you playing. Also has some challenges which give this game a lot of replayability. A "must have" for any gamer's library.
Lejos el mejor juego de puzzle de todos los tiempos

I find this game interesting, but easy for the most part. I went through the majority of the game with ease, and am currently stuck at nearly the end. I can see what to do, but I'm not quite fast enough at portal placing yet. I find that many people get angry with the puzzles when they can't solve them, and would quickly write a negative comment if they owned it. Sure, at a normal pace its a short game, but if you enjoy puzzles you may like it. I won't say that you should or shouldn't get this game, but I am saying that I've enjoyed it, even though I am stuck on a level.

Having played many puzzle, stratagey games I have learned that the best games are often the most simple taken to a ridiculous extreme. The original portal, is a prime example of this, having simple yet intriguing gameplay, and pushing puzzel solving with its limited engine to its limit. I sometimes feel that this game isn't given enough credit since without it we wouldn't have gotten the more complex and continually evolving sequel thanks to the community, ever.
